known_issues: Registration completion flow broken for all user types (participant, provider, etc.)

existing_features.title: Fix the registration completion navigation for Participant role so that after completing the registration form in RegistrationPage.tsx, users are successfully redirected to the ParticipantDashboard
Fix the registration completion navigation for Provider role so that after completing the registration form in RegistrationPage.tsx, users are successfully redirected to the ProviderDashboard
Fix the registration completion navigation for Guardian role so that after completing the registration form in RegistrationPage.tsx, users are successfully redirected to the GuardianDashboard
Fix the registration completion navigation for Plan Manager role so that after completing the registration form in RegistrationPage.tsx, users are successfully redirected to the PlanManagerDashboard

new_feature_requests.summary: Investigate and fix any backend issues preventing successful profile creation that may be blocking registration completion for all user roles
